content: हविस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [हूयते हु-कर्मणि असुन्] {@--1@} An oblation or burnt offering in general; वहति विधिहुतं या हविः <ls>Ś. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 87</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">132</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Clarified butter. {@--3@} Water. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--5@} A sacrifice.
